cleaned_text: Make an Appointment or Contact Us [Book online (massage Monday: 10:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. - Tuesday: 11:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. - Wednesday: 10:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. - Thursday: 11:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. - Friday: 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Location The Graf Center for Integrative Medicine is located on the 5th floor of the Russell and Angelica Berrie Center for Humanistic Care at Englewood Health, 350 Engle Street, Englewood, NJ. We have free valet parking (Monday - Friday).
